name: Uneven Playing Field
text: Send 1 "LV" monster from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "LV" monster from your Deck whose name is listed on that monster ignoring summoning conditions. If a "LV" monster you control is sent to the GY by an opponent’s card: You can banish this card from your GY, and if you do, add 1 "LV" card from your Deck to your hand.
